snippet: Apple said that it had confirmed that its suppliers did not use tantalum, a type of metal commonly used in electronics, containing minerals from areas engaged in warfare.
abstract: Apple releases its supplier responsibility report, noting that its hardware factories do not use any tantalum, metal commonly used in electronics, from areas engaged in warfare; also reports effort to end excessively long workweeks for supplier employees.
lead_paragraph: Apple said that it had confirmed that its suppliers did not use tantalum, a type of metal commonly used in electronics, containing minerals from areas engaged in warfare.

headline.main: Apple Says War Zones Don’t Ship Its Supplies
headline.print_headline: Apple Says War Zones Don’t Ship Its Supplies
